verses.verse: Now the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> after their <S%H4557>number<s%>, to <S%H7218>wit<s%>, the chief <S%H1>fathers<s%> and <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H505>thousands<s%> and <S%H3967>hundreds<s%>, and their <S%H7860>officers<s%> that <S%H8334>served<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> in any <S%H1697>matter<s%> of the <S%H4256>courses<s%>, which came <S%H935>in<s%> and went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> by <S%H2320>month<s%> throughout all the <S%H2320>months<s%> of the <S%H8141>year<s%>, of <S%H259>every<s%> <S%H4256>course<s%> were <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>.

Over the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H4256>course<s%> for the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> was <S%H3434>Jashobeam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2068>Zabdiel<s%>: and in his <S%H4256>course<s%> were <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>.
Of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6557>Perez<s%> was the <S%H7218>chief<s%> of all the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H6635>host<s%> for the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>.

And over the <S%H4256>course<s%> of the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> was <S%H1737>Dodai<s%> an <S%H266>Ahohite<s%>, and of his <S%H4256>course<s%> was <S%H4732>Mikloth<s%> also the <S%H5057>ruler<s%>: in his <S%H4256>course<s%> likewise were <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>.

The <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H6635>host<s%> for the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> was <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%>, a <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%>: and in his <S%H4256>course<s%> were <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>.

This is that <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%>, who was <S%H1368>mighty<s%> among the <S%H7970>thirty<s%>, and above the <S%H7970>thirty<s%>: and in his <S%H4256>course<s%> was <S%H5990>Ammizabad<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>.

The <S%H7243>fourth<s%> captain for the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> was <S%H6214>Asahel<s%> the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H3097>Joab<s%>, and <S%H2069>Zebadiah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H4256>him<s%>: and in his course were <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>.

The <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H8269>captain<s%> for the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> was <S%H8049>Shamhuth<s%> the <S%H3155>Izrahite<s%>: and in his <S%H4256>course<s%> were <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>.

The <S%H8345>sixth<s%> captain for the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> was <S%H5896>Ira<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6142>Ikkesh<s%> the <S%H8621>Tekoite<s%>: and in his <S%H4256>course<s%> were <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>.

The <S%H7637>seventh<s%> captain for the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> was <S%H2503>Helez<s%> the <S%H6397>Pelonite<s%>, of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>: and in his <S%H4256>course<s%> were <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>.

The <S%H8066>eighth<s%> captain for the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> was <S%H5444>Sibbecai<s%> the <S%H2843>Hushathite<s%>, of the <S%H2227>Zarhites<s%>: and in his <S%H4256>course<s%> were <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>.

The <S%H8671>ninth<s%> captain for the <S%H8671>ninth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> was <S%H44>Abi<s%>–ezer the <S%H6069>Anetothite<s%>, of the <S%H1145>Benjamites<s%>: and in his <S%H4256>course<s%> were <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>.

The <S%H6224>tenth<s%> captain for the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> was <S%H4121>Maharai<s%> the <S%H5200>Netophathite<s%>, of the <S%H2227>Zarhites<s%>: and in his <S%H4256>course<s%> were <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>.

The <S%H6249>eleventh<s%> captain for the <S%H6249>eleventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> was <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H6553>Pirathonite<s%>, of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>: and in his <S%H4256>course<s%> were <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>.

The <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> captain for the <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> was <S%H2469>Heldai<s%> the <S%H5200>Netophathite<s%>, of <S%H6274>Othniel<s%>: and in his <S%H4256>course<s%> were <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>.

Furthermore over the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: the <S%H5057>ruler<s%> of the <S%H7206>Reubenites<s%> was <S%H461>Eliezer<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2147>Zichri<s%>: of the <S%H8099>Simeonites<s%>, <S%H8203>Shephatiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4601>Maachah<s%>:
Of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, <S%H2811>Hashabiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7055>Kemuel<s%>: of the <S%H175>Aaronites<s%>, <S%H6659>Zadok<s%>:
Of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, <S%H453>Elihu<s%>, one of the <S%H251>brethren<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>: of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%>, <S%H6018>Omri<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4317>Michael<s%>:
Of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%>, <S%H3460>Ishmaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5662>Obadiah<s%>: of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>, <S%H3406>Jerimoth<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5837>Azriel<s%>:

Of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, <S%H1954>Hoshea<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5812>Azaziah<s%>: of the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, <S%H3100>Joel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6305>Pedaiah<s%>:

Of the <S%H2677>half<s%> tribe of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> in <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, <S%H3035>Iddo<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%>: of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, <S%H3300>Jaasiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H74>Abner<s%>:
Of <S%H1835>Dan<s%>, <S%H5832>Azareel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3395>Jeroham<s%>. These were the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

But <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5375>took<s%> not the <S%H4557>number<s%> of them from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4295>under<s%>: because the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H559>said<s%> he would <S%H7235>increase<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> like to the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>.

<S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah<s%> <S%H2490>began<s%> to <S%H4487>number<s%>, but he <S%H3615>finished<s%> <S%H7110>not<s%>, because there fell wrath for <S%H2063>it<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; neither was the <S%H4557>number<s%> <S%H5927>put<s%> in the <S%H4557>account<s%> of the <S%H1697>chronicles<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>.

And over the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H214>treasures<s%> was <S%H5820>Azmaveth<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5717>Adiel<s%>: and over the <S%H214>storehouses<s%> in the <S%H7704>fields<s%>, in the <S%H5892>cities<s%>, and in the <S%H3723>villages<s%>, and in the <S%H4026>castles<s%>, was <S%H3083>Jehonathan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5818>Uzziah<s%>:

And over them that <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> for <S%H5656>tillage<s%> of the <S%H127>ground<s%> was <S%H5836>Ezri<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3620>Chelub<s%>:

And over the <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> was <S%H8096>Shimei<s%> the <S%H7435>Ramathite<s%>: over the increase of the <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> for the <S%H3196>wine<s%> <S%H214>cellars<s%> was <S%H2067>Zabdi<s%> the <S%H8225>Shiphmite<s%>:

And over the olive <S%H2132>trees<s%> and the sycomore <S%H8256>trees<s%> that were in the low <S%H8219>plains<s%> was <S%H1177>Baal<s%>–hanan the <S%H1451>Gederite<s%>: and over the <S%H214>cellars<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%> was <S%H3135>Joash<s%>:

And over the <S%H1241>herds<s%> that <S%H7462>fed<s%> in <S%H8289>Sharon<s%> was <S%H7861>Shitrai<s%> the <S%H8290>Sharonite<s%>: and over the <S%H1241>herds<s%> that were in the <S%H6010>valleys<s%> was <S%H8202>Shaphat<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5724>Adlai<s%>:
Over the <S%H1581>camels<s%> also was <S%H179>Obil<s%> the <S%H3459>Ishmaelite<s%>: and over the <S%H860>asses<s%> was <S%H3165>Jehdeiah<s%> the <S%H4824>Meronothite<s%>:

And over the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> was <S%H3151>Jaziz<s%> the <S%H1905>Hagerite<s%>. All these were the <S%H8269>rulers<s%> of the <S%H7399>substance<s%> which was <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>'s.

Also <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>'s <S%H1730>uncle<s%> was a <S%H3289>counsellor<s%>, a <S%H995>wise<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>, and a <S%H5608>scribe<s%>: and <S%H3171>Jehiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2453>Hachmoni<s%> was with the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%>:
And <S%H302>Ahithophel<s%> was the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H3289>counsellor<s%>: and <S%H2365>Hushai<s%> the <S%H757>Archite<s%> was the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H7453>companion<s%>:

And <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H302>Ahithophel<s%> was <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%>, and <S%H54>Abiathar<s%>: and the <S%H8269>general<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H6635>army<s%> was <S%H3097>Joab<s%>.
